Chapter 4

Chapter 4: Older Brother's Sexy Pink Panties


Fuck! The blue veins on his forehead jumped. Wei Han quickly broke loose and hid.


“Big…big brother, I’m a 1. Just like you, I push other people down.”


The little mustache uncle listened with a strange expression on his face, “What, you’re actually a 1? No matter how Laozi looks, you don’t look like it.”


Wei Han was crying without tears. He forced a smile and tried to persuade him, “You can’t judge people by their appearances. How can you look at the face to tell this kind of thing.”


If you just look at the face, then with Qi Zhifan’s pretty face, it’d make people want to pounce on him within minutes.


“Tch, but I just like your little face. Why don’t we compare our penises to see whose is bigger? If yours isn’t bigger than mine, then obediently let me press you down.”


Finished talking, little mustache uncle prepared to pull down Wei Han’s pants.


At this moment, there were thousands of mud horses running through Wei Han’s heart. Fuck me, how did I fall under this unscrupulous uncle’s gaze!


There were a lot of people playing in the big room. Originally, it was just the small movements of men flirting in the corner, and it didn’t attract too much attention from other people. But as Wei Han resisted more and more fiercely, the two people’s movements became somewhat bigger, and other people’s sights also slowly shifted.


“Hey Gavin, look. Bear Brother seems to have run into a spirited kid tonight.”


Little Yan smiled and pointed his finger. Qi Zhifan looked in the direction he was pointing at and narrowed his eyes. He felt that the man who was being teased by little mustache uncle looked familiar.


Wei Han’s struggles caused…a sexy pink thong to fall out from his pant pocket. It was so bright, it blinded the eyes of everyone present.


“Hahaha…”


Amidst the other people’s laughter, Qi Zhifan frown deepened. He’d recognized Wei Han.


“Fuck! Enough nonsense. Kid, you still dare to say you’re not a 0, but still carry that thing around, heh heh.”


Little mustache uncle picked up the thong and tossed it to Wei Han, a wretched smile on his face.


Wei Han held the thing that came over, and at this moment, his face turned red with shame. To have this kind of thing fall out under everyone’s gaze, no one could hold on to their dignity.


“This…this, this, this really isn’t mine. Someone forced it on me. I really had no choice but to accept.”


Wei Han hurriedly explained, but little mustache uncle’s hands clamped Wei Han’s shoulders forcefully, entirely deaf to his explanation. “Less fucking nonsense. Anyways, now it’s yours! Since you can accept it, then you should be able to accept sleeping with me for a few nights.”


Obviously, little mustache uncle was trying to “force himself on him”, this kind of trick. Little Yan suddenly felt a chill beside him. He turned his head, and when he saw Qi Zhifan’s look had become especially gloomy, immediately shouted, “Bear Brother, don’t make a fuss here. Even if you want to force someone, you could casually find a place. Don’t you see Gavin’s mood hasn’t recovered yet?”


“I know. I wouldn’t dare to disturb our Gavin here,” Bear Brother answered.


The next second, Qi Zhifan clenched his fist again. The always discerning Little Yan didn’t know that he’d thought wrongly this time.


“I…I am Qi Zhifan’s brother!” In an emergency, seeing that he can’t defend his chastity, Wei Han didn’t care about the other and yelled out loudly.


Everyone: “…”


Seeing Bear Brother’s disbelieving look, Wei Han emphasized again, “Really…it’s true! I’m really Qi Zhifan’s older brother, your Gavin’s older brother. If you don’t believe me, then ask him.”


As a result, one after the other, everyone looked at Qi Zhifan who had been in a depression all along. Qi Zhifan was silent, neither admitting nor denying. His attitude was to completely ignore the person.


Wei Han, who’d thought he had caught a lifeline, was stupefied. What the hell!


Qi Zhifan, this little brother was too heartless, right? Even if they didn’t have any blood relationship, he didn’t even remember brotherly feelings. Whether good or bad, they still lived under the same roof. What’s more, the bastard even ate how many of his home-cooked meals!


Bear Brother grunted and sneered: “Haha, you shouldn’t try to worm your way into being Gavin’s friend. He’s not to be trifled with. You should just obediently lie in my arms tonight.”


“Please just let me go. In fact, as long as it’s not sleeping with me, I’m willing to do anything else.


I can cook delicious food. Whatever you want to eat, I can cook for you.” Qi Zhifan was completely unreliable from the start. Wei Han could only use his expertise in fine cuisine to entice the other.


Bear Brother: “I’m not hungry right now.”


“Then something to drink? I also learned a bit of bartending, and can mix a cocktail for you to drink.”


“The drinks here are ready-made, you mix a fart! Laozi only wants to get on you.” Bear Brother was already very impatient.


“Sing…singing! Then alright, I can sing a little song to amuse big brother and make you happy, okay?”


Looking at the trembling Wei Han with face wanting to cry from embarrassment, Little Yan, who was watching the liveliness, suddenly became interested and smiled, “Oh, then you sing a song for us to hear.”


A dark light quickly flashed through Qi Zhifan’s pupils.


In this situation in a gay bar, Wei Han’s eyes spun around, thinking. Finally, he cleared his throat and “heart tearing and lung splittingly” sung loudly at the top of his lungs–


“Horseman, you’re so mighty and magnificent, horse galloping like a storm. Endless wilderness as you go wandering. Your heart is as vast as the earth…


Horseman, you’re in my heart. I wish to melt in your broad chest, endless wilderness go with you to wander. All the days are as sunny as you…”


Everyone: “…”


Qi Zhifan decisively got up and left.


“Fuck, too fucking bad, so bad I want to throw up! Kid, you’re looking for a beating!”


After little mustache uncle heard this song, he completely had no interest in sleeping with Wei Han and only wanted to beat him up.


“I was born tone deaf. It’s not my fault,” Wei Han said as if he’d been wronged.


“But you dared to fucking sing out for this Laozi to hear, then it’s your fault!”


Little mustache uncle lifted his foot and kicked. This time he was really angry. Tormented by this kid for so long, his lust was choked to death. But he still had to vent out his bellyful of anger.


His foot kicked Wei Han far away. The empty bottles that were piled on the table fell on him, landing on his aching belly. He couldn’t help but spit out a mouthful of acid water.


Bear Brother originally came from a shady background, and his anger didn’t disappear. He again went over and ruthlessly gave him a few more kicks, the pain making Wei Han dazed for awhile.


In this dazed state, Wei Han unconsciously recalled some things from his past life.


He was bullied by his classmates when he was a child. When he worked a part-time job while attending school, he was defrauded by an evil boss. At first, he used his chef’s certificate to work in a restaurant. With great difficulty, he waited until he had a chance to be promoted to a chef, only to have the manager’s nephew come in through the back door. Then he went to the cake shop, and the ‘bully the weak, fear the strong’ miserly shop owner used him as free labor…


Wei Han wasn’t stupid, but he was used to keeping the peace, and never excessively resisted. He would rather suffer more grievances, and swallow whatever complaints he had into his own stomach rather than cause trouble.


But being reborn again, in this life, he must change this!


Grabbing an empty wine bottle on the ground, Wei Han climbed up. Completely throwing caution to the wind, he aimed at Bear Brother’s head and smashed with a “bang”. The wine bottle shattered and the blood poured down.


Blood everywhere! Other people’s eyes were full of turmoil. Little Yan’s mind also darkly said no good. The development seemed to be getting worse.


There was a small puncture hole on his forehead. Although it wasn’t a big injury, it still made Bear Brother’s teeth ached. He seized Wei Han, “Oh, are you fucking looking to die?”


“Dear, how did you run to here?”


A low and graceful voice suddenly drifted in. Dressed in a violet shirt, a man wearing the same-colored earrings on his ears looked at Wei Han with an intimate look in his eyes. He looked to be in his twenties.


Bear Brother was shocked, and he immediately let go. Wei Han turned and stared at this gay violet, and silently thought, Hey, hey, who are you calling “dear”?


“Pei…Master Pei?! What wind brought you here?”


Little Yan laughed “hehe” and went up to greet him, bowing and scraping. Pei Yuyang was the City Section Chief Pei’s third son. They were only small minions, and absolutely couldn’t afford to offend him.


“It’s not a big deal. I was just looking for a person.”


Pei Yuyang waved his hand casually and grabbed Wei Han. His outstanding, handsome and bright face held a tender, honeyed smile. “Ah, dear, you’ve had enough fun tonight. We should go home.”


“…” Wei Han was still very depressed. When did he become this gay violet’s “dear”? Moreover, looking at the other people’s pale and uncertain faces, this person’s identity wasn’t small.


“I’m sorry! Master Pei, I…I really didn’t know he was your man.” Bear Brother completely had none of his imposing manners now, his face deathly pale.


“Eh, this statement is a bit wrong.” Pei Yuyang shook his head, but didn’t explain. He glanced at the wound on Bear Brother’s forehead and lazily said, “I’ll pay for your medical expenses. You should first rest well for a few days.”


In this way, the gay violet who inexplicable appeared and kept calling him “dear”, brought Wei Han out.


As soon as he saw that he was out of danger, Wei Han immediately took Pei Yuyang’s hand off his shoulder, face puzzled said, “Hey, who the hell are you? I obviously don’t know you.”


“Don’t you know me now?” Pei Yuyang swept his front bangs, a roving smile in his eyes, “My name is Pei Yuyang, and I can be seen as…your friend.”


“I haven’t agreed to be friends with you yet.” Wei Han was still very wary, and his expression leveled, “Right, do you also want to sleep with me? I’m telling you clearly, this brother is a 1.”


“OK, I understand.”


“So calm? Could it be you’re a 0?” Wei Han said without thinking, but seeing this person’s reaction, his whole body became very alert and retreated back. “No! I’m not interested in pressing you down. I have no affections for you. Don’t think about it, and don’t be eager to force me. Hey! You say, you look taller and more handsome than me. How could you want someone like me to press you down? You’re a shaking M, right?”


“Wei…Wei Han…”


Pei Yuyang’s smile became somewhat shaky. He clearly hadn’t say anything, but the thoughts of the person in front him had already floated far away. Besides getting out of hand, his mental associative power was truly astonishing.


“Eh, how do you know my name? You wouldn’t have investigated everything beforehand, right?” Wei Han became increasingly uneasy and continued to retreat.


“It’s Ah Fan. He called me over. Qi Zhifan, your little brother.”


Seeing Wei Han retreating further away, Pei Yuyang, who was treated as a villain, expressed his true innocence.


“…” Wei Han’s mood became somewhat complicated.


“I’m Ah Fan’s friend. Can you put your mind to rest now? Then get in the car with me and I’ll take you home.”


Actually, Pei Yuyang also had unspeakable bitter suffering because of Qi Zhifan, this close friend with an eccentric temperament. This early in the night, didn’t he care about whether Pei Yuyang was enjoying a village’s gentle pleasure? With a phone call, he made him rush eight hundred miles to hurry over here.


Since you already knew your older brother was in trouble, why didn’t you go save him yourself? Why did he have to rush over from so far away, and waste so much effort. This person was really proud and arrogant.


Following Pei Yuyang into the car, Wei Han didn’t sit in the passenger seat and directly sat in the backseat. Who knew that when his butt fell down, a clear, cold voice floated out next to him, “How are you so slow. You can really dawdle.”


Fuck, the frightened Wei Han shivered. This man had left earlier. How come he’s still here?


“Aiyo, good Ah Fan, this can’t be blamed on me. Who told your brother to be so heavily vigilant.” Pei Yuyang driving in front, couldn’t help but complain.


Qi Zhifan’s eyes fell on Wei Han. He looked at his messy clothes and the bruises on his arms, but fortunately, they weren’t too serious.


He saw that his “older brother” Wei Han obviously already knew that he’d been merciful and asked his friend to rescue him, but he didn’t seem to have any reaction, not even a “thank you”. Qi Zhifan felt growing traces of displeasure.


“Wei Han, I’ve clearly warned you before. In the end, you amazingly still followed me today.” Without waiting for a response, Qi Zhifan spoke on, “This time you got the little lesson that you deserved. Later on, you⎼”


“Grr…” a strange sound echoed.


“Grumble, rumble…”


Wei Han’s stomach growled at this time. The driving Pei Yuyang “pfft” laughed, and the interrupted Qi Zhifan narrowed his eyes.


“Hey, don’t glare at me, I can’t control it. Can’t I be hungry? I haven’t eaten for hours. I was just beaten until I threw up my morning meal, even throwing up stomach acid. I almost don’t even have bile to spit out…” Wei Han rubbed his stomach. Fortunately his skin was still thick and able to endure a beating.


“Then I’ll immediately find a place to park and get you something to eat at the convenience store nearby,” the amused Pei Yuyang kindly said.


“No need, no need.” Wei Han waved his hand and glanced at Qi Zhifan, “I can’t waste little brother Gavin’s valuable time. I’ll cook noodles to eat when I get home.”


After hearing this, Qi Zhifan lips pressed tighter.


So, close to eleven o’clock in the evening, Pei Yuyang sent Wei Han and Qi Zhifan back to their home, accompanied from time to time by the “grumbling” sound.


Once they arrived downstairs, Wei Han thanked Pei Yuyang, and then he quickly ran upstairs.


“Haha, your brother isn’t only amusing, but he also seems very mensao. This thing…” Pei Yuyang smiled meaningfully and directly threw something that Wei Han had dropped in the car to Qi Zhifan. “Hey, take it, and remember to give it back to your brother.”


Qi Zhifan held the hot pink thong and his brows quickly furrowed…
